title: Can I get an answer for this please?
body: My account was recently hacked and all of my rune pages/masteries were removed (I know not a big deal but still) and I was curious does Riot hold records of the IP addresses of an accounts log ins and if so are they able to disclose that information to the owner of the account? I'd appreciate a helpful response from a Red thanks.

replies.body:
Hello Adjacent World,

Sorry to hear about this mate, we do investigate any cases like this. Since this is sensitive material, we would normally handle this through our player support ticketing system. You can submit a ticket here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us (Click on SUBMIT A REQUEST - in the upper right corner)

Best,
Riot Cochese
